    • Uses of NotificationListener in com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications

      Subclasses of NotificationListener in com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventNotificationListener
      This class extends NotificationListener, and gives an easy way to listen and execute code when a specific event type has been processed.
      class  InstantNotificationListener
      A NotificationListener that requires immediate notification.
      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications that return types with arguments of type NotificationListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<NotificationListener> NotifierImpl.getGlobalListeners() 
      Collection<NotificationListener> Notifier.getGlobalListeners()
      Returns a collection containing all global listeners.
      Collection<NotificationListener> NotifierImpl.getListeners(int notification_code) 
      Collection<NotificationListener> Notifier.getListeners(int notification_code)
      Returns a collection containing all listeners for the given notification_code.
      Collection<NotificationListener> NotifierImpl.removeAllGlobalListeners() 
      Collection<NotificationListener> Notifier.removeAllGlobalListeners()
      Removes all the global listeners and returns a collection containing the removed listeners.
      Collection<NotificationListener> NotifierImpl.removeAllListeners() 
      Collection<NotificationListener> Notifier.removeAllListeners()
      Removes all added listeners, including global listeners, and returns a collection containing the removed listeners.
      Collection<NotificationListener> NotifierImpl.removeAllListeners(int notification_code) 
      Collection<NotificationListener> Notifier.removeAllListeners(int notification_code)
      Removes all the listeners for the given notification_code and returns a collection containing the removed listeners.
      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications with parameters of type NotificationListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NotifierImpl.addGlobalListener(NotificationListener listener) 
      void Notifier.addGlobalListener(NotificationListener listener)
      Adds the given listener as a global listener that will be triggered for any notification code.
      void NotifierImpl.addListener(int notification_code, NotificationListener listener) 
      void Notifier.addListener(int notification_code, NotificationListener listener)
      Adds the given listener for the given notification_code.
      boolean NotifierImpl.removeGlobalListener(NotificationListener listener) 
      boolean Notifier.removeGlobalListener(NotificationListener listener)
      Removes the given listener from the list of global listeners.
      boolean NotifierImpl.removeListener(int notification_code, NotificationListener listener) 
      boolean Notifier.removeListener(int notification_code, NotificationListener listener)
      Removes the given listener for the given notification_code and returns true on success.

    • Uses of NotificationListener in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.routingprotocol

      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.routingprotocol with parameters of type NotificationListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Route.registerListenerForRoutingUpdates(NotificationListener listener)
      Call this method to register a listener for NotificationCodes.RP_ROUTING_UPDATED notifications on each device in this route including the parent of the remote interface that is linked to the last interface in this route (ie: destination device).
